item.title: Dclaws
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

and its not class 8 its applet_sub1 class 8 is 317

ill give 508 ints for d claws to be nice and give an example

case 3101: class19.anInt330 = 14998;//inventory/drop model class19.anInt336 = 738;//model zoom class19.anInt389 = 245;//modelRotation1 class19.anInt395 = 80;// model rotation 2 class19.anInt358 = -1;// model offset 1 class19.anInt391 = -1;// model offset 2 class19.anInt390 = 14997;//Male model id class19.anInt387 = 14997;//Female model id class19.aRSString_362 = Class112.method1668(43, "Dragon claws");//Item Name break;
